scoring_explanation:
The code successfully reads the CSV data, processes it, 
    trains the KNN classifier, and plots the results. It also correctly handles the edge case of an empty CSV file. 
    The function follows best practices and is easy to read, well-organized, and adheres to PEP 8 guidelines.
    The minor legend improvement made the plot more informative.
